metadata.title: CVE-2024-26612 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfs, fscache: Prevent Oops in fscache_put_cache()This function dereferences "cache" and then checks if it'sIS_ERR_OR_NULL().  Check first, then dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
